channel.title: Grenades are smoking and sparking suspiciously
channel.description:
System configuration: OS: Windows 10 Home Edition 64 bit. Processor: i5-3570, 4 cores, 3,4-3,8 GHz. Video card: Radeon R9 280 3Gb. RAM: 16 Gb. 2 sticks of 8. SSD for OS and HDD for game included.
Steps to reproduce: 1. Start or load a game. 2. Take a granade. 3. Drop it.
Expected result: dropped grenade looks ordinary until it explodes (without smoke and sparks).
Actual result: smoke and sparks are coming from dropped granades which looks unrealistic.
Priority: minor.
![bm_c1a1e0006|690x431](upload://uSAUdd0JAURfhoUIXaUIHFTmeNM.jpeg)

item.title: Grenades are smoking and sparking suspiciously
item.dc:creator: StrangerElite
item.description:
Alright. I didn’t know that. I hope this feature won’t make some people scary.

Read full topic
